âThe '''Pneumococcal Awareness Council of Experts (PACE)''' is a project of the [[Sabin Vaccine Institute]] and is comprised of global experts in [[infectious disease|infectious diseases]] and [[vaccine|vaccines]]. Established in December 2006, The Council seeks to raise awareness among policymakers and aims to secure global commitments to prevent [[pneumococcal disease]], a leading infectious killer of children and adults worldwide.<ref name="WHO Pneumococcal Vaccines">World Health Organization, [http://www.who.int/vaccines/en/pneumococcus.shtml/ "Pneumococcal vaccines"]</ref> The Council works in collaboration and partnership with countries, [[Non-governmental organization|NGOs]], academia and industry.
âThe '''Pneumococcal Awareness Council of Experts (PACE)''' is a project of the [[Sabin Vaccine Institute]] and is comprised of global experts in [[infectious disease|infectious diseases]] and [[vaccine|vaccines]]. Established in December 2006, The Council seeks to raise awareness among policymakers and aims to secure global commitments to prevent [[pneumococcal disease]], a leading infectious killer of children and adults worldwide.<ref name="WHO Pneumococcal Vaccines">World Health Organization, [http://www.who.int/vaccines/en/pneumococcus.shtml/ "Pneumococcal vaccines"]</ref> The Council works in collaboration and partnership with countries, [[Non-governmental organization|NGOs]], academia and industry.
